_header: Behold how good and jocund it is
_description: James Ryman, in praise of brotherly love — a single stanza rhyme royal

CULEe112.First Lines:
Beholde how good & Iocunde it isBrothers to dwelle in
                    vnite…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…God graunt vs alle by his grete graceThat we may be in his
                    resting place
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 267.
